document.full_text: ivory coast's deposed former leader laurent gbagbo urged supporters on monday to drop political quarrels for now and help the west african country revive its economy in peace.
document.title: ivory coast's gbagbo urges supporters to seek peace
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's deposed former leader laurent gbagbo urged supporters on monday to drop political quarrels for now and help the west african country revive its economy in peace.
